title: Bug 14047: StyledText inefficient redraw during text change with word wrap
OB: Appending N lines to StyledText in word wrap mode results in N redraws of the entire client area.
EB: The StyledText should only redraw the affected lines when appending N lines in word wrap mode.
SR:
To reproduce the issue, follow these steps:
1. Enable word wrap mode in the StyledText.
2. Append N lines to the StyledText.
3. Observe if the entire client area is redrawn N times.
